str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To wash; mid. I wash my own (hands, etc.). To cleanse; ceremonially, to perform ablution.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The foot. A primary word; a 'foot'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ana and pipto; to fall back, i.e. Lie down, lean back.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
